nodes.bodyText: What is this supposed to do? This syntax with // is not documented
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -57,7 +57,7 @@ fi
 if [ -n "$NUXEO_CLID" ]; then
   echo "ENTRYPOINT: Write NUXEO_CLID environment variable to /var/lib/nuxeo/instance.clid"
   # Replace -- by a carriage return
-  NUXEO_CLID="${NUXEO_CLID/--/\\n}"
+  NUXEO_CLID="${NUXEO_CLID//--/\\n}"

nodes.bodyText: Ok sorry it is documented, I didn't read the bash doc carefully enough.
